name: Paths & Danger
summary:
Paths & Danger is a procedural turn-based RPG with a dark twist. Join in on an adventure where you must gather a balanced group of heroes to embark on a series of quests and uncover the great mystery surrounding the province of Westwall.

To complete each quest, you must travel many paths in which you have to deal with random encounters and different situations and make the best of it.
Upon completing many quests, you must hire and recruit new members for your party, each with different skills. You can also increase the success of your adventures by improving your character's gear and equipment. Plus, pack up all sorts of potions, loot precious gems and gold to help you along the journey.
